eating_survey_10.Description: I am always hungry so it is hard for me to stop eating before I finish the food on my plate.

eating_survey_11.Description: When I feel lonely, I console myself by eating.

eating_survey_12.Description: I consciously hold back at meals in order not to weight gain.

eating_survey_13.Description: I do not eat some foods because they make me fat.

eating_survey_14.Description: I am always hungry enough to eat at any time.

eating_survey_15.Description: How often do you feel hungry?

eating_survey_16.Description: How frequently do you avoid 'stocking up' on tempting foods?

eating_survey_17.Description: How likely are you to consciously eat less than you want?

eating_survey_18.Description: Do you go on eating binges though you are not hungry?

eating_survey_19.Description: On a scale of 1 to 8, where 1 means no restraint in eating (eating whatever you want whenever you want it) and 8 means total restraint (constantly limiting food intake and never 'giving in') what number would you give yourself?

eating_survey_2.Description: When I smell a sizzling steak or juicy piece of meat, I find it very difficult to keep from eating, even if I have just finished a meal.

eating_survey_3.Description: I deliberately take small helpings as a means of controlling my weight.

eating_survey_4.Description: When I feel anxious, I find myself eating.

eating_survey_5.Description: Sometimes when I start eating, I just cant seem to stop.

eating_survey_6.Description: Being with someone who is eating often makes me hungry enough to eat also.

eating_survey_7.Description: When I feel blue, I often overeat.

eating_survey_8.Description: When I see a real delicacy, I often get so hungry that I have to eat right away.

eating_survey_9.Description: I get so hungry that my stomach often seems like a bottomless pit.
